actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the limitation on the number of cadets or midshipmen who may be appointed in the Reserves from the two-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course.

summary.text: Removes the limitation on the number of cadets or midshipmen who may be appointed to the Reserves from the two-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the limitation on the number of cadets or midshipmen who may be appointed in the Reserves from the two-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course.
